turkish_example_sentence: Onlar o parlak fikri alsalar hemen uygularlardı.
english_example_sentence: If they were to take that brilliant idea, they would implement it immediately.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы они взяли ту блестящую идею, они бы немедленно ее реализовали.
